Review_Text: Entertaining and engaging piece for a great first ballot hall of famer. Would have liked more behind the scenes looks into his signature sneakers.Highly recommend for sports fans and basketball fans alike. Very motivating and heartwarming story that all kids and adults can look up to. Perseverance is everything and this man definitely persevered through a lot with a smile on his face.Would like an additional update looking into his deserved Hall of Fame induction and multiple jersey retirements. Also, is he currently beefing with Gilbert Arenas? Let's get his thoughts on the crap Gil said about him on his show.
